headline: Lowe's Completes Acquisition of Artisan Design Group
summary: Lowe's Companies, Inc. (NYSE: LOW) today announced it has completed its previously announced acquisition of Artisan Design Group ("ADG"), a leading nationwide provider of design, distribution and installation services for interior surface finishes to home builders and property managers.

raw.headline: Lowe's Completes Acquisition of Artisan Design Group

(NYSE: LOW) today announced it has completed its previously announced acquisition of Artisan Design Group ("ADG"), a leading nationwide provider of design, distribution and installation services for interior surface finishes to home builders and property managers.

headline: Lowe's Rewards Shareholders With 4% Increase in Quarterly Dividend
summary: LOW boosts its quarterly dividend by 4% to $1.20, signaling strong financials and a steady focus on shareholder value.

headline: MasterBrand: Leader In Residential Cabinet Business, Trading At Deep Discount
summary: MasterBrand utilizes its differentiated product segments to generate significant FCF to balance its operating leverage. See why I rate MBC stock a Buy.
